quiz.question: I came down from heaven as the living word of God, my first days started in a stable. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus’ mission on earth was to ‘show and tell’. Show us how to think and behave, and tell us the good news on how to be saved and be with God forever.

quiz.question: Who declared that "The Spirit of the Lord spoke by me, and His word was on my tongue."?
quiz.additional_info: Archaeologists consistently find evidence that biblical stories are true. The ancient "City of David" was discovered in 1867 proving David was a real person.

quiz.question: I wear armour for my own protection and I’m highly trained. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Like the Roman soldier, a christian soldier must wear armour for our own safety and protection. We are in battle 7 days a week.

quiz.question: According to the Bible, who ordered Jesus to be crucified?
quiz.additional_info: The crucifixion of Jesus was also documented in historical documents by the Roman Senator Tacticus.

quiz.question: Which apostle walked on water?
quiz.additional_info: Peter was also put in prison but was released by an angel.

quiz.question: Who ate a diet of locust and honey in the desert?
quiz.additional_info: People would flock to the desert to hear John the Baptist’s message. He called the religious leaders a ‘generation of vipers’.

quiz.question: I worked so hard to make sure that everyone was fed, that I didn’t take in Jesus’ words. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Martha was nourishing the body, Mary was nourishing her soul.

levels.name: Level 02
levels.award_verse: ...and with your feet fitted with the readiness that comes from the gospel of peace.

quiz.question: Which prophet rebuked David for his evil actions?
quiz.additional_info: God still expects us to live righteous lives that reflect who we say we are.

quiz.question: What prophet, the wife of Lappidoth, led Israel in the Book of Judges?
quiz.additional_info: God gives all His people special insight, wisdom and knowledge.

quiz.question: I had a son very late in life. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Sarah had much trouble trusting God. If God promises something, we better believe it.

quiz.question: Who was given a coat ,woven of many beautiful colours, for his 17th birthday?
quiz.additional_info: Wearing the coat meant that Jacob thought more of Joseph than his older brothers. Favoritism creates division and Jealousy.

quiz.question: Who was afraid that God’s people would become stronger than his own nation, that he made them slaves?
quiz.additional_info: Ten plagues did not convince Pharaoh he was dealing with a powerful God.

quiz.question: I anointed the first king over Israel. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: God told Samuel to warn the people a king would order them about, oppress and tax them.

quiz.question: Who, out of eight brothers, tended his father’s sheep?
quiz.additional_info: David learnt courage and tenderness while caring for sheep which was later used in battle and dealings with others.

levels.name: Level 03
levels.award_verse: ...with the breastplate of righteousness in place,...

quiz.question: Who said to Jesus "You are the Messiah, the Son of the living God."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus has called us into righteousness.

quiz.question: Who wrote "This righteousness is given through faith in Jesus Christ to all who believe."?
quiz.additional_info: God is good! Jesus is the way!

quiz.question: Who was the first king of Israel?
quiz.additional_info: King Saul started out well, but soon fell into disobedience. He wasted most of his time chasing David through the hills instead of building up Israel.

quiz.question: Which of Saul’s sons became a friend to David?
quiz.additional_info: Jonathan was a famous archer.

quiz.question: I am the mother of Solomon. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: David killed Bathsheba’s husband then took her for his wife.

quiz.question: My name means “fool or idiot”. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Nabal and his farm worker narrowly avoided being killed by David and his men.

quiz.question: Who built the Temple at Jerusalem?
quiz.additional_info: Solomon was a merchant as well as a monarch. He sent ships to Africa and brought back, among other things, exotic creatures like apes and baboons.

levels.name: Level 04
levels.award_verse: Stand firm then, with the belt of truth buckled around your waist,...

quiz.question: To whom did Jesus say "I was born and came into the world to testify to the truth. Everyone on the side of truth listens to me."?
quiz.additional_info: We testify that Jesus is Lord! That He is the Truth

quiz.question: Who said "Speak, for your servant is listening"?
quiz.additional_info: To hear God, we need to get in His presence and listen.

quiz.question: Which prophet was fed by ravens?
quiz.additional_info: The raven is the first bird named in the bible.

quiz.question: My big mistake was to come under the influence of my wife Jezebel. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Ahab was on the throne at the same time Elijah was prophet.

quiz.question: Who was the cousin of Esther and raised her like a daughter?
quiz.additional_info: Mordecai discovered a plot to kill the king.

quiz.question: I put my parents through a lot of worry when I stayed after the Feast of the Passover. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: After three days Jesus’ parents found Him in the Temple.

quiz.question: While on earth, I showed people my power over created things, and the greatest love of all. I will lay down my life for them. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: “I am the way, and the truth, and the life; no one comes to the Father, but through Me”. (John 14:6)

levels.name: Level 05
levels.award_verse: ... take up the shield of faith, with which you can extinguish all the flaming arrows of the evil one.

quiz.question: Who did God speak to in a "small still voice"?
quiz.additional_info: God favors small things! A word from God changes everything!

quiz.question: Who sang "The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer...in whom I take refuge, my shield and the horn my salvation."?
quiz.additional_info: Our God is our great defender!

quiz.question: They try to keep every part of the law God had given Moses, plus some more of their own?
quiz.additional_info: Pharisees gave the outward appearance of keeping the Law, but their hearts were far from God.

quiz.question: Which men came from the east to worship Jesus after his birth?
quiz.additional_info: The Magi were experts in maths and science. Their entrance into Israel was monitored by Herod by means of hill-top forts.

quiz.question: Who was the Roman Governor who sentenced Jesus to death?
quiz.additional_info: Pilate knew Jesus was innocent and able to uphold justice, instead he gave in to the demands of the crowd. He washed his hands of it.

quiz.question: Two angels asked me why I was weeping. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Mary Magdalene didn’t recognise Jesus because He had risen again and had a changed body.

quiz.question: In a parable, this man requests Lazarus give him water to cool his tongue as he is in flames?
quiz.additional_info: How we treat others is important. The rich man finds out that after death there is no second chance of salvation. Rev 20:15

quiz.question: Who was covered in sores and waited for scraps from a richman’s table?
quiz.additional_info: During Lazarus’s life on earth he received bad things, but now he is comforted in heaven. Luke 16:2

quiz.question: I was robbed, beaten and left half dead on the side of the road. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: What does your behaviour reveal when no one is watching?

quiz.question: Who helped the injured man lying on the dirt road?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus never calls this man good, but He does call him a Good Samaritan.

quiz.question: Who sat at the feet of Jesus and listened to Him teach?
quiz.additional_info: Mary poured expensive perfume on Jesus’ feet. The presence of its aroma showed only the best had been offered.

quiz.question: Who lost their wealth, health and family for a short period?
quiz.additional_info: Job said ”Naked I came from my mother’s womb, And naked I shall return there. The Lord gave and the Lord has taken away. Blessed be the name of the Lord.”(Job 1:21)

levels.name: Level 06
levels.award_verse: ...and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

quiz.question: Who lived in Ur and moved to a country he did not know?
quiz.additional_info: Abraham was asked by God to leave his family because they worshipped false idols and were a distraction to the plan God set for him.

quiz.question: His father was directed to sacrifice him on Mt. Moriah?
quiz.additional_info: Isaac was spared by the divine provision of a ram. He was obedient to his father unto death. (Gen 22:5-12)

quiz.question: I killed an Egyptian taskmaster. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Moses gained education and military training while in the Egyptian court. This would be put to good use later.

quiz.question: Which female judge asked Barak to lead her forces against the king of Cannon?
quiz.additional_info: The palm tree that Deborah sat under and judged Israel was a landmark.

quiz.question: Who killed 1000 Philistines with the jaws of a donkey?
quiz.additional_info: Samson was a Nazarite. They were not allowed to drink wine, touch unclean things or cut their hair. Samson broke all three rules.

quiz.question: Who was told to "Strike the rock, and water will come out of it for the people to drink."?
quiz.additional_info: Jesus is our rock!

quiz.question: Who defeated Satan by quoting God's word?
quiz.additional_info: We are given authority over the enemy in Jesus' name!

levels.name: Level 07
levels.award_verse: All around him was a glowing halo...

quiz.question: I dedicated my son Samuel to the Lord. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Whenever Hannah and Elkanah visited Samuel, she brought him a coat to wear.

quiz.question: Who said “Am I a dog, that you come to me with sticks?”
quiz.additional_info: Goliath was weighed down with heavy armour and could only engage in close-range combat.

quiz.question: I first married a fool, then a King. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Abigail in her wisdom sorted out the mess her foolish husband got them in.

quiz.question: I held King David to account for killing Uriah and stealing his wife. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Nathan also told David that he would not be the one to build the Temple.

quiz.question: I was one of David’s mighty men. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Uriah had a great sense of duty and loyalty to David. So much so, David had trouble getting rid of him to cover his heinous crime.

quiz.question: Who prayed "Your name is in this temple. And we will cry out to You in our distress, and You will hear and deliver."?
quiz.additional_info: The battle belongs to the Lord!

quiz.question: Who prayed "May the Lord our God be with us...may he never leave us nor forsake us. May he turn our hearts to him..."?
quiz.additional_info: What a good prayer!

levels.name: Level 08
levels.award_verse: They will soar on wings like eagles...

quiz.question: Who was asked three times by Jesus if they loved Him?
quiz.additional_info: He is a good God who loves you!

quiz.question: Who asked "Why does your Teacher eat with tax collectors and sinners?"
quiz.additional_info: God desires mercy. He is a merciful God!

quiz.question: Who was chosen out of many women to reside in the royal court of Xerxes?
quiz.additional_info: Esther succeeded Vashti as queen and was able to save her people.

quiz.question: Who ate grass for 7 years?
quiz.additional_info: Pride leads to the abuse of power. At the end of seven years, Nebuchadnezzar’s reason returned and blessed the Most High. Dan 4:34

quiz.question: He was taken hostage by Nebuchadnezzar on the first attack on Jerusalem?
quiz.additional_info: God gave Daniel and his friends 10x the knowledge and wisdom of all the magicians. Additional gifts were given to Daniel to understand visions and dreams. (Dan 1:17-20)

quiz.question: I am a wicked queen who killed prophets. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: Jehu disposed of Jezebel by having her thrown out the palace window.

quiz.question: I travelled far to speak to the wisest man on earth. Who am I?
quiz.additional_info: The Queen of Sheba came to Jerusalem with a camel train of gold, spices and precious stones.

levels.name: Level 09
levels.award_verse: They will soar on wings like eagles...
